name: The Classroom (CosmicFoxx22)
description:
We've all had that one professor who just seems to be rolling dice for our grades. -- In this game, you get to play from that professor's perspective. Finish all your work in time, but don't cut too many corners! -- If you do... you may be fired.

How many days can you last?

Note: F11 to see the full game after it has launched (F11 again to go back to normal)
